member.summary: The currently loaded package.

member.name: M:DragonEngine.Engine.FindType(System.String)
member.summary: Find a specified type via a string name.
member.param: The type name to search for.
member.returns: The type or nothing if it was not found.

member.name: M:DragonEngine.Engine.GetTypeOfFile(System.String)
member.summary: Get the type of a specified file. Must be a file with a double dot extension where the middle keyword is a valid type. Throws InvalidCastException if this is not the case.
member.returns: The type or nothing if the type was not found.

member.name: M:DragonEngine.Engine.NewProject(System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Creates a new project in the working directory, overwriting the previous one.
member.param: Whether this action should show a dialog if it will overwrite files.
Whether to create deafult project objects.

member.name: M:DragonEngine.Engine.OpenProject(System.String)
member.summary: Load a project from a package.

member.summary: The single instance of the GameProperties class, so that PropertyGrid and JsonSerializer can reference an object.

The file to save the data to.

member.summary: Reads an object from disk into memory.

member.returns: The object read from the disk.

member.summary: Clean up any open objects that are null.
